version_description: Bug fixes

All new design version.
1. *Support play video before download.
2. Support more video sizes.
3. Support more image sizes.
4. Speed up download.
5. Speed up get thumbnail.
6. Use iCatch SDK 1.9.12, more stable and compatible.
7. Fix ta

We are looking for your feedback, if you have any problem please leave camera name, app version and error message on our website.
http://www.icatchtek.com/fae.asp
We will improved it and enhance new function in the future.

Fix some crash iss

1. Support 4K camera.
2. Fix some camera will crash on setting
3. New UI design

. Change capture shutter sound
. Fix app cannot connect to camera issue.

1. Fix iOS8 cannot download issue
2. Fix sometime time-lapse crash when camera disconnect.

1. Delay start preview streaming
2. Remove signal handler
3. Fix sometime image single playback fail issue.

Q&A
Q: Why cannot create a new camera?
A: First make sure you have follow connection step and established the connection, se

New function:
1. Enhance Share function, now can share video to social network.
2. Now the preview streaming have a shorter delay time on camera return a zero cache time.
3. Auto clean temporary file while successfully create a new camera & c

1. Compatible with iOS10
2. Show the alert message while cannot access Photos
3. Fix duplicated store photos and videos issue

Some people feedback us they cannot download the big video files (more than 2GB), thanks for your feedback, we are c

1. Fix app will make camera stop record when connect to camera that recording is in progress issue.
2. Fix sometime App crash issue.
3. Update SDK to 1.9.17

1. Support bluetooth camera.
2. Add AD, we try to have a better expensive for you, but for my life, please tape AD when you have free time.
3. Update to iCatch SDK 1.11.1.
4. In setting page you can see all of camera supported setting, iSmart DV

*Fix some bug
*Now you can Live to facebook on preview. (see detail)
Detail:
1. Required a cellular network and a Camera support H.264 + AAC audio preview
2. Connecting to camera and login Facebook in Setting.
3. Authorized iSmart DV app

1. Fix crash issue when entering setting page on some camera.
2. You can temporally remove AD now.
Fix iPhone 4s, 5, 5C cannot connect to camera issue.

1. Fix cannot change delay capture setting issue.
2. Support 2.7K video size
3. Now you can see the filename, size and date in file list page.

1. Fix some download issue.
2. Fix V50 camera will crash in the setting
3. Compatible iOS 11

1. Fix photo mode preview size mismatch picture issue.
2. Fix some camera cannot save preview screen issue.
3. Preview performance enhance.
4. Support iCatch V50 camera.
Support V50/V35 speed photo capture.

1. support video file duration
2. support iPhoneX
3. now can update camera timezone if camera supported.
4. re-layout first page.
5. Add a help page to guide you how to connect to camera.

. Fix timezone update fail issue.

You can visit our Facebook Fans (iSmart DV user,https://www.facebook.com/ismartdvuser/) to ask any question or share your nice experience.
Thank you.

1. Support more 1080p 120fps video size.
2. Fix a blank block on remote file list when scrolling Video and Photos issue.
3. Fix some playback issue
4. Update iCatch SDK to formal release version.
